segments.text: How can that woman just stand there drying a stupid plate while the sink floods!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the edge, ruining the floor, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked, but she's obliviousâ€”it's infuriating!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids climbing on that wobbly stool like it's a jungle gym.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching into the cookie jar, breaking all the rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's helping, hand out like she deserves a treat for mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's about to tip, and if he falls, it'll be on her watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is unacceptable in a kitchen full of hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is tidy, but inside it's chaos she ignores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinets and stacked dishes are just waiting for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not paying attention to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene boils my blood with frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR
